data.name: Cursed Wood
data.description: Wood from trees that grew in places of dark magic. It whispers disturbing secrets when the wind blows through it.

data.name: Cursed Plank
data.description: A plank made from cursed wood. Tools used to cut it tend to break mysteriously, and carpenters report nightmares.

data.name: Malefic Shard
data.description: A jagged fragment of dark crystal that pulses with malevolent energy. Even touching it briefly leaves your fingers numb. These shards can be exchanged for a powerful item.

data.name: Corrupted Fruit
data.description: A strange fruit with dark veins running through its flesh. Despite its ominous appearance, it has powerful healing properties.

effects.description: Heal 800 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Bat Wing
data.description: A leathery wing from a giant bat. Useful for potions and slightly unsettling decorations.

data.name: Orc Skin
data.description: Thick, tough skin from a fierce orc. Renowned for its toughness and use in armor.

data.name: Fish Soup
data.description: A hearty soup made from the finest fish. Restores a massive amount of health.

effects.description: Heal 600 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Sanguine Edge of Rosen
data.description: A legendary blade, forged in honor of Rosenstjerne, the first to uncover an artifact in the realm. Its edge glows with a crimson light, inspiring adventurers to seek their own destiny.

effects.description: Adds 75 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Fire Shield
data.description: A blazing shield that repels fire with ease, but may make you a bit breezy.

effects.description: Adds 25% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds -5% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 200 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Water Shield
data.description: A shield that shimmers with a watery sheen. Defends well against water, but earth will find its way through.

effects.description: Adds 25% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds -10% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 200 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Air Shield
data.description: A light and swirling shield that guards against air magic, but is a bit susceptible to fire.

effects.description: Adds 25% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds -5% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 200 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Earth Shield
data.description: Solid as a rock, this shield shrugs off earth attacks. Not so great when facing a flood.

effects.description: Adds 25% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds -10% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 200 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Rosenblood Elixir
data.description: A potent elixir said to contain the will and spirit of legendary heroes.

data.name: Batwing Helmet
data.description: A helmet adorned with bat wings. Grants fierce earth power, but with a touch of wild magic.

effects.description: Adds 200 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 40% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10 Threat to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds -5% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds -5% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Salmon
data.description: A large, shiny salmon. Favored by both chefs and hungry adventurers.

data.name: Cooked Salmon
data.description: A perfectly grilled salmon fillet. Restores a large amount of health.

effects.description: Heal 400 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Greater Health Potion
data.description: A powerful potion that heals even the most grievous wounds.

effects.description: Restores 200 HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of their health points.

data.name: Health Boost Potion
data.description: Grants a massive boost of health at the start of any fight. Drink up and feel unstoppable!

effects.description: Add 250 HP at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Wolfrider Hair
data.description: Long, wild hair from the elusive Wolfrider. Makes for strong cords and rare potions.

data.name: Hork Helmet
data.description: A helmet worn by legendary heroes of the north. Imbued with the power of the wind.

effects.description: Adds 200 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 40% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10 Threat to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds -5% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds -5% Air Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Glowstem Leaf
data.description: A luminous leaf from the rare glowstem plant. Used in potions that shine with magical light.

data.name: Mithril Ore
data.description: A rare, silvery ore that glows faintly. Essential for crafting the strongest weapons and armor.

data.name: Mithril Bar
data.description: A shimmering bar of mithril, prized for its lightness and unmatched strength in weapon forging.

data.name: Maple Plank
data.description: A plank of finely milled maple wood. Both sturdy and elegant, perfect for masterwork carpentry.

data.name: Maple Wood
data.description: Fine-grained maple wood from ancient groves, sought after for advanced crafting.

data.name: Enchanted Boost Potion
data.description: A rare potion that invigorates your attacks with the power of all the elements at once.

effects.description: Add 20% water damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.
Add 20% fire damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.
Add 20% earth damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.
Add 20% air damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Hellhound Bone
data.description: A scorched bone from a legendary hellhound. Radiates eerie heat, even in your bag.

data.name: Broken Sword
data.description: The remains of a once-mighty blade. Blacksmiths may still find use for its fragments.

data.name: Hellhound Hair
data.description: Dark hair from a hellhound, warm to the touch and favored in powerful enchantments.

data.name: Raw Hellhound Meat
data.description: Meat from a hellhound that's still warm to the touch. Dangerous to eat raw, but incredibly nutritious when cooked.

data.name: Cooked Hellhound Meat
data.description: A fiery dish that warms you from the inside out. Restores a tremendous amount of health.

effects.description: Heal 600 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Greater Emerald Amulet
data.description: An enhanced emerald amulet with incredible power. The gem seems to contain a swirling breeze.

effects.description: Adds 130 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 100 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Greater Sapphire Amulet
data.description: An improved sapphire amulet of extraordinary quality. The gem seems to contain an ocean's depth.

effects.description: Adds 130 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 100 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Greater Topaz Amulet
data.description: A refined topaz amulet with superior enchantments. The gem pulses with the might of mountains.

effects.description: Adds 130 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 100 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Greater Ruby Amulet
data.description: A perfected ruby amulet of astonishing power. The gem seems to contain a dancing flame.

effects.description: Adds 130 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 100 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Mithril Sword
data.description: A legendary sword forged from pure mithril. Whispered to be able to cut through stone like butter.

effects.description: Adds 70 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Mithril Platebody
data.description: A magnificent chestpiece forged from pure mithril. Lighter than steel yet stronger than diamond.

effects.description: Adds 200 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 22% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Adds 100 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 4 Threat to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Mithril Helm
data.description: A helmet of unparalleled craftsmanship, forged from mithril by master smiths. Fit for royalty.

effects.description: Adds 300 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 24% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 16% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Adds 6% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 50 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Mithril Platelegs
data.description: Leg armor crafted from mithril with incredible attention to detail. Both beautiful and functional.

effects.description: Adds 250 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 6 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.
Adds 22% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 19% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 100 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5 Threat to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Lightning Sword
data.description: A sword that crackles with electricity. Fast as lightning and twice as dangerous.

effects.description: Adds 50 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 22 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Ruby Book
data.description: An ancient tome bound in leather with a ruby embedded in its cover. The pages contain fire magic that few can comprehend.

effects.description: Adds 20% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Emerald Book
data.description: A tome bound with emerald-studded covers that seems to whisper with the voices of the wind. Contains powerful air magic.

effects.description: Adds 20% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Sapphire Book
data.description: A book with sapphires that seem to ripple like water on its cover. The pages are always cool to the touch.

effects.description: Adds 20% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Topaz Book
data.description: A heavy tome adorned with topaz gems that feel as solid as the earth itself. Its pages contain ancient earth magic.

effects.description: Adds 20% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Bloodblade
data.description: A crimson sword that seems to drink the blood of its victims. The blade is warm to the touch, as if alive.

effects.description: Adds 70 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
